description: This program educates, connects, and supports startups with the potential to speed innovation for the Department of Defense, developing next generation technologies helping make our world a safer place. The Safety and Security Track is a partnership between MassChallenge, the National Security Innovation Network, MITRE, BAE Systems, and Raytheon. Eligibility: early-stage startups in AI/ML, Secure Communication, Crypto, Cybersecurity, Modeling and Simulation, Human Capital Improvement, Layered Systems, Data and Predictive Analytics, Decision Support, Imaging, Electronic Warfare and Systems, Sensors, IoT and Blue Tech. [Applications due March 31.](https://www.nsin.us/events/2021-02-17-propel-mc-accelerator/)
title: Safety and Security Accelerator 2021
